display_long_description:
Crush Lab is a deeply satisfying glass-breaking app you have never experienced before! Shoot balls to break the beautiful glass objects, avoid crashing your head, and survive until the end of the level. In this app, you can not only enjoy the thrill of breaking glass, but also relax with calm graphics paired with harmonious music. At the same time, you will forget everything about reality. So play it now and become a master of breaking glass!

# Two Modes Available
One mode showcases minimalist style art, where the player becomes a flying adventurer, perfect for those who enjoy challenges.
[media]
The other mode features a neon light show scene, perfect for beginners or players with motion sickness, as it requires no movement.
[media]
# Full Immersion And Mixed Immersion
You can easily switch between full immersion and mixed immersion.
[media]
# Satisfying ASMR
Deeply satisfying glass-breaking mechanics and a perfect antistress remedy for when you're feeling stressed.
[media]
# Epic Physics Destruction
We built a custom voxel physics engine to create a unique and realistic physics destruction experience.
[media]
# Musically Synchronized Gameplay
With calm graphics paired with harmonious music, you will lose yourself in the soothing ambiance created by this relaxing app.
[media]
# Key Features:
- Two Modes Available
- Full Immersion And Mixed Immersion
- Satisfying ASMR
- Epic Physics Destruction
- Musically Synchronized Gameplay

Shoot balls to break the beautiful glass objects, avoid crashing your head, and survive until the end of the level. In this app, you can not only enjoy the thrill of breaking glass, but also relax with calm graphics paired with harmonious music. At the same time, you will forget everything about reality. So play it now and become a master of breaking glass!

One mode showcases minimalist style art, where the player becomes a flying adventurer, perfect for those who enjoy challenges.

# Full Immersion And Mixed Immersion
You can easily switch between full immersion and mixed immersion.

# Satisfying ASMR
Deeply satisfying glass-breaking mechanics and a perfect antistress remedy for when you're feeling stressed.

# Epic Physics Destruction
We built a custom voxel physics engine to create a unique and realistic physics destruction experience.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473392334_973373174716914_7112655064661124760_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fQCaNGBp83UQ7kNvwHqSZ81&_nc_oc=AdklZI03cJg0DuvJAxRqKe79omOTpC18WagExe6770qZYTdX1LD7uScGiqrx9g0oc6s&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=q0B49Wxx0BXNAXta_1YCJA&oh=00_AfEJpi9kUlDsl3E30Eia8dKK79qWwEtQav57LvX47ylEUg&oe=68125409)
# Musically Synchronized Gameplay
With calm graphics paired with harmonious music, you will lose yourself in the soothing ambiance created by this relaxing app.
